description: This file defines the BookingEntity class, which models a booking record for various facilities within the airport passenger service platform. It includes fields such as ID, passenger ID, facility ID, booking type, status, reference code, timestamps, amount, and notes, along with appropriate JPA annotations for ORM mapping.

classes.name: BookingEntity
classes.description: Entity class representing a booking record for airport facilities such as parking, lounge, or hotel. It includes mappings for database persistence and provides getter and setter methods for each field.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the booking.

methods.name: setId
methods.description: Sets the unique identifier of the booking.

methods.name: getPassengerId
methods.description: Returns the UUID of the passenger associated with this booking.

methods.name: setPassengerId
methods.description: Sets the UUID of the passenger.

methods.name: getFacilityId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the facility associated with this booking.

methods.name: setFacilityId
methods.description: Sets the facility ID.

methods.name: getBookingType
methods.description: Returns the type of facility booked (enum).

methods.name: setBookingType
methods.description: Sets the facility booking type.

methods.name: getStatus
methods.description: Returns the current status of the booking.

methods.name: setStatus
methods.description: Updates the booking status.

methods.name: getReferenceCode
methods.description: Returns the reference code associated with the booking.

methods.name: setReferenceCode
methods.description: Sets the reference code.

methods.name: getStartAt
methods.description: Returns the start time of the booking.

methods.name: setStartAt
methods.description: Sets the start time of the booking.

methods.name: getEndAt
methods.description: Returns the end time of the booking.

methods.name: setEndAt
methods.description: Sets the end time of the booking.

methods.name: getAmount
methods.description: Returns the total amount for the booking.

methods.name: setAmount
methods.description: Sets the total amount.

methods.name: getCurrencyCode
methods.description: Returns the currency code used for the amount.

methods.name: setCurrencyCode
methods.description: Sets the currency code.

methods.name: getNotes
methods.description: Returns additional notes related to the booking.

methods.name: setNotes
methods.description: Adds or updates notes.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the booking was created.

methods.name: setCreatedAt
methods.description: Sets the creation timestamp.

methods.name: getUpdatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the booking was last updated.

methods.name: setUpdatedAt
methods.description: Updates the 'last modified' timestamp.
